snippet.title: Computer Football Strategy - 1983 - C64
snippet.description: This is a bad one.... Computer Football Strategy waiss simply substandard for 1983. It does not create the graphics nor the depth required for a good managerial game for 1983. It is not that a managerial game would require great graphics, but if the developers decided to create some graphics, they could have done better to simulate the game of football on a powerful computer such as the C64.
